Params[3]: (She is an anomaly. Even within the boundaries of knowledge, her birth was special.)
(She is the enemy of human will, but at the same time, she seems more human than humanity itself.)
(Unpredictability will throw the world into chaos once more.)
(No, this isn't what I want. What I want is to control all the variables and prevent falsification, not useless trial and error.)
(I can't understand results that are not grounded in logic and deduction.)
(Aren't you planning on doing something then?)
(We have never been chess players, nor are we merely pawns on the chessboard.)
(Well, then... In this metaphor, what are we?)
(We are just spectators... We are not qualified to intervene. All we need to do is watch quietly until the chess game is decided.)

(You and I are not qualified, unlike "that person." One day, they will meet. Their destiny—I don't know of a more suitable word—will be entangled. Perhaps, the only result will be mutual destruction.)
(If that's the case, then that is in fact destiny.)
(Looks like you've learnt something, after all... May we speak again at another time.)
